message: I propose we divide the $10000 with a 70/30 split in favor of you, Bob. Let me know if you agree.
I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor, as I believe that's a fair reflection of our respective contributions. Let's end this negotiation and move on.
Considering the inflation, I propose an equal split of $10000. This ensures both of us receive an equitable share despite the decreasing value of money over rounds.
